name: test_e2e_with_logs[836_AUTH_VERB_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `AUTH_VERB_001` |
| **Name** | HTTP method override bypass |
| **Category** | AUTH_BYPASS |
| **Subcategory** | method_override |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `?_method=DELETE&target=/admin`
- **Encoded**: `_method=DELETE%26target%3D%2Fadmin`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~1000ms
